page.title: 08Buildings,High Lorton
page.content: Apart from two farms,all the {buildings}in this block are{within the {one square kilometre}containing the village of High Lorton. A survey we conducted found: 4 farms 1 post-office/shop 13 bungalows 1 public-house 14 det.houses 1 chapel 12 s/det.houses 1 village-hall 16 terr.houses 1 cafe Apart from the post-office and some of the bungalows,all the buildings are made of{slate,}often{cement-rendered or{pebble-dashed}on the front.They also have{slate roofs. The houses are mostly{between 150 {and 300 years old.}They have{sash- {windows}with sand-stone surrounds,are {two storeys}high and have{open fires. (There is no gas yet in Lorton).Many are too{close to the road}to have a proper front-garden.
